job.title: Software Development Engineer in Test, HelloSign - Location Flexible
job.description: ltstronggtcompany descriptionltstronggtltbrgt ltpgtdropbox is a leading global collaboration platform thats transforming the way people work together from the smallest business to the largest enterprise with more than million registered users across more than countries our mission is to design a more enlightened way of working from our headquarters in san francisco to eight dedicated studios and a worldwide team of employees who choose where they work best our virtual first approach is leading the way into the future of workltpgtltbrgt ltstronggtteam descriptionltstronggtltbrgt ltpgtour engineering team is working to simplify the way people work together theyre building a family of products that handle over a billion files a day for people around the world with our broad mission and massive scale there are countless opportunities to make an impactltpgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltstronggtrole descriptionltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtas a quality assurance engineer you will be a quality champion you will empower your partner engineering team at dropbox to maintain a high level of quality in our products with a large amount of scope and impact within your role our approach to quality assurance engineering involves a small highly talented and leveraged team that focuses on manual testing end to end testing test strategy and process improvements while working in an embedded manner with crossfunctional engineering and product teamsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltligtyou will ensure that dropbox software is highquality by building product test strategies writing and executing test plans and communicating with the team about issues risk and product qualityltligtltligtidentify and execute on opportunities to improve the qa processltligtltligteducate engineering and product on testing and qa partner with them to determine product quality goals and measurementsltligtltligtpartner with engineering to triage inbound bug reports and reproduce reported issuesltligtltulgtltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtrequirementsltstronggtltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltligtbs ms or phd in computer science or related technical field involving coding eg physics or mathematics or equivalent technical experienceltligtltligt years industry experience in quality assurance years preferredltligtltligtexpertise in manual testing across multiple platforms and testing techniquesltligtltligtproven technical expertise such as via programming experience or academic coursework in computer scienceltligtltligtdedication to quality and process improvement with a positive collaborative attitude and approach to testingltligtltligtcomfortable working in a dynamic lowstructure constantly changing atmosphere and prioritizing work appropriatelyltligtltligtstrong qa project leadership experienceltligtltulgtltbrgtltbrgt ltpgtdropbox is an equal opportunity employer we are a welcoming place for everyone and we do our best to make sure all people feel supported and connected at work a big part of that effort is our support for members and allies of internal groups like asians at dropbox blackdropboxers latinx pridebox lgbtq vets at dropbox women at dropbox atx diversity based in austin texas and the dropbox empowerment network based in dublin irelandltpgt
